entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm near the Swan Hills. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. High minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets ending near midnight then clearing. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
